about.title: WHAT TIRIS DOES
about.description: Tiris is committed to utilizing artificial intelligence technology to implement quantitative trading strategies that can be consistently profitable. And to make the benefits of quantitative trading available to every trader, even if they are completely technically illiterate.

profitable.title: Profitable
profitable.description: Our trading strategy, developed based on the cutting edge machine learning technology and validated by extensive historical data backtesting, has earned a 140% return on ETH/USDT trading throughout 2024.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: We only provide trading strategies and do not hold user funds in custody like traditional hedge funds. Your funds are safely held in your own account in exchanges.

automatic.title: Automatic
automatic.description: Our smart strategies are encapsulated in trading robots. The robot can work 24/7 without any breaks and is not affected by emotions.

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: We have hidden all the technical details so that users can turn on automated quantitative trading with a single click in a simple and easy-to-use interface.

performance.title: LIVE PERFORMANCE DEMONSTRATION
performance.description: See how our ML-powered trading bot has performed with real backtest data compared to ETH benchmark. This shows actual trading decisions made by our algorithm based on historical market analysis.
performance.loading: Loading real trading data from our ML-powered trading system...
performance.noData: No trading data available at this time.

highlights.title: KEY PERFORMANCE HIGHLIGHTS
highlights.outperforming: Outperforming ETH: Algorithm achieved superior returns compared to holding ETH directly
highlights.riskManagement: Risk Management: Controlled drawdowns through intelligent position sizing and ML-driven decisions
highlights.realTimeAnalysis: Real-time Analysis: Performance data updated from live backend equity curve calculations
